bounded_contexts.name: Order Management
bounded_contexts.purpose: Handles all order-related operations including creation, modification, and fulfillment tracking

ubiquitous_language.Order: A customer's request to purchase products
ubiquitous_language.OrderItem: A single product line within an order
ubiquitous_language.Fulfillment: The process of preparing and shipping an order

bounded_contexts.name: Customer Management
bounded_contexts.purpose: Manages customer registration, profiles, and authentication

ubiquitous_language.Customer: A registered user who can place orders
ubiquitous_language.Registration: The process of creating a new customer account

bounded_contexts.name: Product Catalog
bounded_contexts.purpose: Manages product information, pricing, and availability

ubiquitous_language.SKU: Stock Keeping Unit - unique product identifier
ubiquitous_language.Catalog: The collection of all available products

context_relationships.description: Order context consumes customer data for order association
Order context uses product information for line items
Catalog receives inventory updates based on order events
